name: Inn
_source: speak;Man2;Hey, you.|Weren't you with that dancer earlier?|Can you help us?|We need a dancer for today's show.
speak;Marisa;Who, me?|I don't know how to dance.
speak;Man2;Hey, I recognize you!|Aren't you the Crimson Flash?|You could show off your sword skills!
speak;Man2;I'll make it worth your while.|C'mon, the show's getting started soon.
speak;Man2;The crowd really loved your moves out there!
speak;Man2;No need to be so humble.|Here, take this as your payment.

speak;Man2;Ah...|I wonder if that dancer will ever come this way again.|I don't know why, but her dances really pepped me up.|Even after a hard day's work, I felt as fresh as if I'd just woken up!|It sure would be nice if she would dance for me again someday.
